snippet: Mr. Phillips, whose paintings appear in the collections of MoMA and the Tate Modern, has recently developed a love for performance driving, enabled by his 1992 Porsche 965.
abstract: Mr. Phillips, whose paintings appear in the collections of MoMA and the Tate Modern, has recently developed a love for performance driving, enabled by his 1992 Porsche 965.

headline.main: In Turbocharged Porsches, Artist Richard Phillips Finds a New Muse
